rows.label: bf10240150_0010
rows.name:
When a person loses something,
they cannot help but seek a reason why.

rows.label: bf10240150_0030
rows.name: They seek a concrete answer to the question

rows.label: bf10240150_0040
rows.name: of who they really are, deep inside.

rows.label: bf10240150_0060
rows.name: But perhaps that is what it is to be human...
